synopsis:
The scutes glisten in the corner of her mind and she starts to dig her memories up. What was like the museum director she encountered when she was lost?

Graduate Work 2015, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

Director: Megumi ISHITANI
Music: Soyoka HAYASHI
Sound Design: Masumi TAKINO
Producer: Mitsuko OKAMOTO

(Source: Tokyo University of the Arts)
